verses.text: Out of the depths I call to you, \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*.
Lord, hear my voice: give heed with your ears to my loud plea.
If you should mark sin, \+w Lord|strong="H3050"\+w*, O \+w Lord|strong="H3050"\+w*, who could stand?
But with you is forgiveness, that you may be feared.
I wait for the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*, I wait for his word,
I look for the Lordmore than watchman for morning, than watchman for morning.
Israel, hope in the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*: with the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*there is love with him plenteous redemption.
And he redeems Israel from all his iniquities.
